message:
Near the beginning of this post I have a link to Tess' excellent blog where she describes a lot of the common causes. Also, by default ASP.NET will recycle every 29 hours for no reason at all.  

Note that these are all default behaviours. A lot of hosting providers will tighten up these a lot and even add other conditions (if your web site isn't being hit for a day/hour/minute, then from their perspective they can save money and scale better by unloading your AppDomain).
